item.title: Notes
item.description: This branch (emilyyao.me/notes/) is used for notes that I take in class. Other content can be found here. I’m currently taking classes that I find interesting or reviewing things I’ve previously learned.

item.title: Stream
item.description: This serves as a hub for all of my recent edits on my website. All of my writing is organized into three categories ‚Äî seed (üå∞) for quick thoughts, leaf (üåø) for revised ideas, and fruit (ü•≠) for completed blog posts.

item.title: Ubuntu 22.04 with UTM
item.description: No easy way to dual boot with the M1 chips – UTM is a software specifically for macOS to run VMs or emulate other machines How to create a new Ubuntu VM: Install the 22.
